collection:
This policy outlines our practices regarding
data collection, use, and security, ensuring transparency and trust in our
service.

### Data Collection

We collect data necessary to generate your documents, such as user inputs and
usage data.

This may include information provided during document creation,
along with technical data like usage patterns and preferences.
sharing:
### Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell or rent user data.

Data may be shared with third-party
services, such as the GPT API, for the purpose of generating documents.
